attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
not the people, however, but the jackets.
Whilst its true its a 'fashion' item, they are used also to extent by people engaging in criminal activity to hide their faces and so make it difficult to identify them, this has proliferated, and the situation with them is untenable. There is no option but to simply ban the sale of them in the UK, so criminals or those wishing to hide something will not be able to use them.
Its pure common sense.

rejection.details: A petitioner is required to give a full name.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
